      • MakeFrom

        public static TAVPAGSticker MakeFrom(TAVPAGAsset asset,
                                     long startTime,
                                     long duration,
                                     long stretchDuration)
        Creates a PAGSticker object from the specified asset, return null if the asset is null or it's not a valid asset. User can specify the startTime、duration and stretchDuration.

      • numImages

        The number of replaceable images.
